001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.service;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
006
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008
009/**
010 * Simple interface for sending signed "raw" transactions
011 */
012public interface SendTransactionService {
013
014    /**
015     * Broadcast a signed transaction on the P2P network
016     * @param signedTransaction A signed, ready-to-broadcast transaction
017     * @param maxFeeRate Reject transactions whose fee rate is higher than the specified value, expressed in BTC/kB.
018     * @return A future for the transaction hash
019     */
020    CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash> sendRawTransaction(Transaction signedTransaction, Coin maxFeeRate);
021
022    /**
023     * Broadcast a signed transaction on the P2P network.
024     * <p>
025     * This method has no maxFeeRate and behaves as if maxFeeRate were set to zero.
026     * @param signedTransaction A signed, ready-to-broadcast transaction
027     * @return A future for the transaction hash
028     */
029    default CompletableFuture<Sha256Hash>  sendRawTransaction(Transaction signedTransaction) {
030        return sendRawTransaction(signedTransaction, Coin.ZERO);
031    }
032}
